questions.question: Which of the following is the primary memory structure of a Pushdown Automaton (PDA)?
Which computational device can recognize a larger class of languages?

answers.d: Both PDA and TM recognize the same class of languages

questions.question: What is the primary difference between a finite automaton and a Turing machine?

answers.a: A Turing machine has multiple tapes
answers.b: A Turing machine has a read/write head and can modify its tape
answers.c: A finite automaton has an infinite tape
answers.d: A Turing machine cannot change states
